mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, waybill_code AS waybillCode, action_code AS actionCode, target_object AS targetObject, target_object_name AS targetObjectName, target_field AS targetField, target_field_name AS targetFieldName, data_source AS dataSource, visible_config AS visibleConfig, description AS description, remark AS remark, disabled AS disabled, deleted AS deleted, module_code AS moduleCode, creator_user_code AS creatorUserCode, creator_username AS creatorUsername, create_time AS createTime, update_user_code AS updateUserCode, update_username AS updateUsername, update_time AS updateTime, ip AS ip, operator_longitude AS operatorLongitude, operator_latitude AS operatorLatitude, owner_user_code AS ownerUserCode, owner_org_code AS ownerOrgCode, owner_org_name AS ownerOrgName, synchronous_id AS synchronousId FROM waybill_action_field WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO waybill_action_field ( waybill_code, action_code, target_object, target_object_name, target_field, target_field_name, data_source, visible_config, description, remark, disabled, deleted, module_code, creator_user_code, creator_username, create_time, update_user_code, update_username, update_time, ip, operator_longitude, operator_latitude, owner_user_code, owner_org_code, owner_org_name, synchronous_id ) VALUES ( #{waybillCode}, #{actionCode}, #{targetObject}, #{targetObjectName}, #{targetField}, #{targetFieldName}, #{dataSource}, #{visibleConfig}, #{description}, #{remark}, #{disabled}, #{deleted}, #{moduleCode}, #{creatorUserCode}, #{creatorUsername}, #{createTime}, #{updateUserCode}, #{updateUsername}, #{updateTime}, #{ip}, #{operatorLongitude}, #{operatorLatitude}, #{ownerUserCode}, #{ownerOrgCode}, #{ownerOrgName}, #{synchronousId} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE waybill_action_field
waybill_code = #{waybillCode},
action_code = #{actionCode},
target_object = #{targetObject},
target_object_name = #{targetObjectName},
target_field = #{targetField},
target_field_name = #{targetFieldName},
data_source = #{dataSource},
visible_config = #{visibleConfig},
description = #{description},
remark = #{remark},
disabled = #{disabled},
deleted = #{deleted},
module_code = #{moduleCode},
creator_user_code = #{creatorUserCode},
creator_username = #{creatorUsername},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_user_code = #{updateUserCode},
update_username = #{updateUsername},
update_time = #{updateTime},
ip = #{ip},
operator_longitude = #{operatorLongitude},
operator_latitude = #{operatorLatitude},
owner_user_code = #{ownerUserCode},
owner_org_code = #{ownerOrgCode},
owner_org_name = #{ownerOrgName},
synchronous_id = #{synchronousId},
WHERE id = #{id}
